alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 5:20AM AKST until December 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of one inch. West winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan for difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts could form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and the lowest visibilities expected this evening through early Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
